description.zh: 加州大学欧文分校维护的经典机器学习数据集库，ML研究的黄金标准基准数据集
description.en: Classic ML dataset repository maintained by UC Irvine, gold standard benchmark datasets for ML research

authority_justification.zh: UC Irvine 维护 30+ 年，被 10万+ 论文引用，ML 领域最权威的基准数据集来源
authority_justification.en: Maintained by UC Irvine for 30+ years, cited by 100,000+ papers, most authoritative benchmark source in ML

access_method.python: pip install ucimlrepo; from ucimlrepo import fetch_ucirepo
